TEST.QUERY: SELECT c.id, c.title, c.context as context_ori, cc.context as context_con, q.q_id, q.question, q.answer, q.answer_start, CHAR_LENGTH(q.answer) FROM SQUAD_KO_WIKI.all_qna AS q INNER JOIN SQUAD_KO_WIKI.all_context_ori AS c ON q.c_id = c.id INNER JOIN SQUAD_KO_WIKI.all_context AS cc ON q.c_id = cc.id ORDER BY ABS(c.id)

DEFAULT.QUERY: SELECT c.id, c.title, c.context as context_ori, cc.context as context_con, q.q_id, q.question, q.answer, q.answer_start, CHAR_LENGTH(q.answer) FROM SQUAD_KO_WIKI.all_qna AS q INNER JOIN SQUAD_KO_WIKI.all_context_ori AS c ON q.c_id = c.id INNER JOIN SQUAD_KO_WIKI.all_context AS cc ON q.c_id = cc.id WHERE SUBSTRING_INDEX(q.q_id, '_', 1) = 1 OR SUBSTRING_INDEX(q.q_id, '_', 1) = 3 OR SUBSTRING_INDEX(q.q_id, '_', 1) = 4 OR SUBSTRING_INDEX(q.q_id, '_', 1) = 5 OR SUBSTRING_INDEX(q.q_id, '_', 1) = 18 ORDER BY ABS(c.id)

CHE_DUP_CON2.#####f2f3: f2는 안 중복 된 거 여기에 저장, f3은 중복된 거 여기에 저장 (c_id-title-context_ori-context_con-q_id-1-q-1-answer-q_start-len_answer-rm_context-con_start-ex_answer-q_id-2-q-2-m_context-m_ex_answer)
